label:english: She made her choice and has violated god’s rule, it is better not to get involved
label:luganda: Yesalirawo namenya amateeka ga Katonda, kisingako obutabiyingiramu

label:english: Regardless of what this woman did, we should try to help her
label:luganda: Kyona omukyala ono kyeyakola tulina okugezako omuyamba

label:english: When a person suddenly falls ill, it is most likely due to witchcraft.
label:luganda: Singa omuntu alwaala mubwangu, mukisa gwawaggulu okuba kivudde ku ddogo.

label:english: When a person suddenly falls ill, there is most likely a medical explanation for it.
label:luganda: Singa omuntu alwaala mubwangu, mukisa gwawaggulu okuba nti kisobola okunnyonnyolwa mu ngeri eyekisawo

label:english: 0 did not know about the screenings
They should wait for the situation to improve on its own
If friends and family take action, they can stop the violence
label:luganda: Singa abemikwano n'engamda babaako kyebakola, basobola okukomya obutabanguko

label:english: Meddling in the couple’s affairs won’t help because things will eventually go back to how they were
label:luganda: Okweyingiza mu nsonga z'abagalana tekijja kuyamba kubanga ebintu oluvanyuma  bijja kuddayo nga bwebyali

label:english: Others from the village would provide first aid
label:luganda: Abalala mu kyalo basobola okukuwa obujanjabi obusokerwako

label:english: The VHT would provide first aid
label:luganda: Omusawo wekyalo asobola okukuwa obujanjabi obusokerwako
